alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 3:52PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN SULLIVAN COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 351 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Haven, or near Middletown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Bloomingburg, Highview, Haven, and Basha Kill. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 113 and 114. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central New York.
